update `CBIF`
CBIF02 = #{cbif02,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF03 = #{cbif03,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBIF04 = #{cbif04,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF05 = #{cbif05,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBIF06 = #{cbif06,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF07 = #{cbif07,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF08 = #{cbif08,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF09 = #{cbif09,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CBIF10 = #{cbif10,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CBIF11 = #{cbif11,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

CBIE01 = #{cbie01,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF14 = #{cbif14,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where CBIF01 = #{cbif01,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update `CBIF` set CBIF02 = #{cbif02,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF03 = #{cbif03,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBIF04 = #{cbif04,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF05 = #{cbif05,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBIF06 = #{cbif06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF07 = #{cbif07,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF08 = #{cbif08,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF09 = #{cbif09,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBIF10 = #{cbif10,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBIF11 = #{cbif11,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBIF12 = #{cbif12,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBIF13 = #{cbif13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBIE01 = #{cbie01,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF14 = #{cbif14,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CBIF01 = #{cbif01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.CBIE07,a.CBIE02,b.CBWA09,c.CALA08,d.CBSA08,g.CBPA07,h.CALA08,f.CBPB12, f.CBPB15,f.CBPB08,e.CBIF13,a.CBIE01 FROM CBIE a LEFT JOIN CBWA b on b.CBWA01=a.CBIE09 LEFT JOIN CALA c on c.CALA01=a.CBIE16 LEFT JOIN CBIF e on e.CBIE01=a.CBIE01 LEFT JOIN CBSA d on d.CBSA01=e.CBIF14 LEFT JOIN CBPB f ON f.CBPB01=e.CBIF08 LEFT JOIN CBPA g on g.CBPA01=f.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CALA h on h.CALA01=f.CBPB10 where a.CBIE01= #{cbie01,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT (@i:=@i+1) AS '序号' , e.CBPA07 as totalclassify, d.CBPA07,h.CALA08,c.CBPB12,c.CBPB15,c.CBPB08,b.CBIF09,f.CBWA09,g.lock_qty,c.CBPB01 FROM CBIE a LEFT JOIN CBIF b on a.CBIE01=b.CBIE01 LEFT JOIN CBPB c on c.CBPB01=b.CBIF08 LEFT JOIN CBPA d on d.CBPA01=c.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CBPA e ON e.CBPA01=d.CBPA09
LEFT JOIN CBWA f on f.CBWA01=a.CBIE09 LEFT JOIN gs_goods_use g ON b.CBIF08=g.goods_id and a.CBIE09=g.lock_qty LEFT JOIN CALA h ON c.CBPB10=h.CALA01, -- -- LEFT JOIN -- gs_goods_sku g -- ON -- a.CBIE09=g.wh_id, (SELECT @i:=0) AS itable where a.CBIE06=0 and f.CBWA09 = #{cbwa09} and h.CALA08 = #{cala08} and c.CBPB08 = #{cbpb08} and c.CBPB01 = #{cbpb01}

select a.CBOA07,b.CBCA08,a.CBOA25,d.CBPA07,f.CALA08,c.CBPB12,g.lock_qty, e.CBOB09,e.CBOB10,e.CBOB15 from CBOA a LEFT JOIN CBCA b ON b.CBCA01=a.CBOA09 LEFT JOIN CBOB e ON e.CBOA01=a.CBOA01 LEFT JOIN CBPB c ON c.CBPB01=e.CBOB08 LEFT JOIN CBPA d ON d.CBPA01=c.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CALA f ON f.CALA01=c.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN gs_goods_use g ON g.order_no=a.CBOA07 where a.CBOA06=0
and d.CBPA07 like concat('%', #{cbpa07}, '%')
and f.cala08 like concat('%', #{cala08}, '%')
and c.CBPB01=#{cbpb01}

SELECT a.CBOA07,a.CBOA08,c.CBCA08,d.CAUA17,f.CALA08,g.CBPA08,e.CBPB12,b.CBOB10, (b.CBOB09-b.CBOB10)as num,b.CBOB11,b.CBOB12 FROM CBOA a LEFT JOIN CBOB b ON a.CBOA01=b.CBOA01 LEFT JOIN CBCA c ON c.CBCA01=a.CBOA09 LEFT JOIN CAUA d ON d.CAUA01=a.CBOA10 LEFT JOIN CBPB e ON e.CBPB01=b.CBOB08 LEFT JOIN CALA f ON f.CALA01=e.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN CBPA g ON g.CBPA01=e.CBPB14 where a.CBOA06=0
and c.CBCA08 like concat('%', #{cbca08}, '%')
and d.CAUA17 like concat('%', #{caua17}, '%')
and e.cbpb01=#{cbpb01}
and date_format(a.CBOA08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.CBOA08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')

SELECT e.CBPA07,d.CBPA08,f.CALA08,c.CBPB12,c.CBPB15,c.CBPB08,b.CBOF09,g.CBCA08,a.CBOE08 from CBOE a LEFT JOIN CBOF b ON a.CBOE01=b.CBOE01 LEFT JOIN CBPB c ON b.CBOF08=c.CBPB01 LEFT JOIN CBPA d ON d.CBPA01=c.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CBPA e ON e.CBPA01=d.CBPA09 LEFT JOIN CALA f ON f.CALA01=c.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN CBCA g ON g.CBCA01=a.CBOE09 where a.CBOE06=0
and d.CBPA08 like concat('%', #{cbpa08}, '%')
and f.CALA08 like concat('%', #{cala08}, '%')
and c.cbpb01=#{cbpb01}

SELECT a.CBBA07,c.CALA08,b.CBPB12,b.CBPB08,a.CBBA09,a.CBBA11,a.CBBA14,a.CBBA13,a.CBBA12 FROM CBBA a LEFT JOIN CBPB b ON a.CBBA08=b.CBPB01 LEFT JOIN CALA c ON c.CALA01=b.CBPB10 where a.CBBA06=0
and a.CBBA07 like concat('%', #{cbba07}, '%')
and a.CBBA12 like concat('%', #{cbba12}, '%')
and b.cbpb01=#{cbpb01}
